content: Family Education Asked by AnonymousAsked on 19 Nov 2018Is it worth it to send my child for courses like Adam Khoo learning? I see many parent's sending them for such courses but I'm hesitating because they are so expensive. Are they effective?1 answerAnswerBump0

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 20 Nov 2018Maybe you can check out what the children do in these courses, and how it helps these children. You may also wish to look for reviews online/ask for reviews from people you know who are sending your kids to these courses!0 comments0
